text: 15:19 Jon 17:14; 1 Jon 4:5Ia nguazir kamɨn gumazamizibar mɨn ikɨtɨ, nguazimɨn gumazamiziba uan adarazigh ifongezɨ moghɨn, ia gifongegham. Ezɨ ia nguazir kamɨn gumazamiziba puvatɨ. Kɨ ia mɨsevegha gɨfa, ezɨ ia nguazir kamɨn araziba ataki. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nguazimɨn gumazamiziba ian aghuagha ian apanim gami.
